title: Uku ukai (2006) - Audrionys

Renowned Lithuanian documentarist Audrius Stonys took these words as a motto for his latest film, a meditative visual essay which portrays old people undertaking all kinds of activities, meditation and group laughter therapy. Without a single word of commentary, he creates from sophisticated, aesthetic images a compelling study of human corporeality which, in an ideal union with spiritual equilibrium, can sustain us with the pledge that old age doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t have to be a painful wait for the last breath.
